content.new: When controlling Atlas via the cmd_vel topic Gazebo slows down dramatically over time. When I try to move Atlas along the road in vrc task 1 I start with a real-time factor of 0.5 in the pen, by the time I reach the first corner it's down to ~0.22 and by

issue.title: cmd_vel Atlas gliding slows down Gazebo over time
